3: There are still quite a few hostile bionics around.
There aren't as many as before. New Murmansk should become safer now that Amberia has been silenced.
Speaking of, Commandant. You and Rosetta completed the mission together, huh. We were doing data collection for Lucia at the time.
Thankfully, you completed the mission in one piece.
...I'm glad that everyone came back alive.
Well, of course. This isn't our commandant's first time in battle.
But back on to Amberia... What is she anyway?

2: She was a monster born out of sin.

3: What the commandant means is, Amberia was designed by technicians with distorted obsessions.
Even just going through the video records and files afterwards, I can't help but feel... a shiver run down my spine.
Oh, it's nothing. It just makes me kinda... sad.
Humanity brought about the tragedy of Amberia, and we're here to protect humanity...
Liv looks at you blankly. Liv's Levi-Guns seem a little wobbly in the air.

2: We'll change the world for the better.
